Package main

Class Battle

java.lang.Object
main.Battle
public class Battle extends Object
This class implements the functionality of a battle
Author:
Callum Hampton, Geordie Gibson

    • playerMove

      public int playerMove(int moveSelection, Player player, GameEnvironment game)
      Implements the events that occur when a players turn occurs
      Parameters:
      moveSelection - Index of move selected to use
      player - Player of the game
      game - Game Environment instance
      Returns:
      Outcome of the battle - 0 = Player killed enemy warrior but they have more, 1 = Player didn't kill enemy warrior, 2 = Game won

    • enemyMove

      public int enemyMove(Player player, GameEnvironment game)
      Implements the events that occur when an enemy turn occurs
      Parameters:
      player - Player of Game
      game - Game Environment instance
      Returns:
      Outcome of the battle - 0 = Enemy killed player warrior but they have more, 1 = Enemy didn't kill player warrior, 2 = game lost
